input.sentences: all the sellers were here to display their products .
the seller had some lovely pillows and stuffed animals .
i especially like the dolls she had | they were so ornate .

output.sentences: As the market begins the sellers  place their products on display.
Some sells stuffed animals as the sellers just sells pillows.
Others ornate dolls and sells them.
This woman makes an outstanding jewelry with found recycled items.
And theres a spot where the kiddos can make their own products to sell to the customers.
